content.detailedDescription:
It was canadas day so we had fireworks we were setting the last one off then after it was just about done an object apeared 
-it was very high in the sky(so it was hard to determine the size)
-two lights beside eachother (lights possibly belonged to another craft)
-faster than any plane (that we see in our area because our house is a spot where planes fly over)
-no sound
-we took a couple pictures but the object did not appear
at first it looked like a sattelite but it clearly wasen`t

the flight path was completely straight

my feelings were curiousity to find out what it was

the object flew past a tree so we lost our sight
content.summary: Two star-like shapes in unicine

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from soho and saw a silver egg shaped object while i was traversing bowery (street) , i pointed it out to my friend and it changed color and went behind a building, we stopped and waited for it to fly past the building and when it emerged it was a black boomerang shape approximately 1cm in length to the naked eye from where we were standing.

two elderly men also saw the ufo and we were staring at it for about 5 minutes, it just stayed in the sky at the same spot so it couldn't have been a weather balloon, then it slowly changed back into a cigar shape and then into a small egg shaped and was still for another 5 mins, we began walking back downtown and never took our eyes off it, but then it started getting smaller and smaller and then there was an airplane that flew past, but when the airplane got close the ufo just disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo spotted over lower manhattan

content.detailedDescription: I was walking n. up monaco parkway toward hampden, about 2 blocks s. of hampden ave. when i saw what i thought at first was a zeppelin, when i noticed how smoothly, and high it was flying. when it reflected the sun it was a brilliant silver. it was in a flight pattern going from east to west, being just north of myself in the sky. it flew very slowly, and i see planes flying out of dia all day long so i just watched it to see if there was an undercarriage, wings, whatever that would conclude it was a craft that i could explain. it continued in a westerly direction. after about 3-4 minutes of flying very slowly in that direction, it abrubtly, yet smoothly turned southerly at which time it sped up expenentially then disappearing all together into the blue sky. this has been about the 7th ufo ive seen over 20 years, first ive reported. it doesnt even shock me anymore.
content.summary: A long silver cylinder

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the back porch steps of my friends house with his wife. as we talked we both were engulphed with a very intense white light. it swept across the ground and illuminated everything like daylight, except it was to white of a light. it seemed artificial. like stadium lighting.
i completely expected to see a helicoper with spotlights on it. but when i looked up there was nothing. i ran around the house and looking all around there was nothing. there were some people sitting at a picknick area a few hundred yards away and they didn't seem to react at all. like they were un aware of anything happening. when my friend got home from hunting before i could say what we saw he told me a story of what they saw. he said while hunting they saw a big purple star like fireball with blue tail. meteor like flying throu the sky twards town(us). they said it light everything up like daylight. and he also said it extinguished before hitting the ground, or before it left sight. he didnt say it was falling but going across the sky. ive seen shooting stars, but never when they illuminate the night with an artificail daylight. my friend was hunting aprox 10 miles from where we were. i just would like to know if anyone else saw this or what it was????
content.summary: Bright sweeping illumination.

content.detailedDescription: Would not like to explain story on here , contact me at phone (number deleted)fg, i have 2 clear pictures and 2 eye witnesses.
content.summary: Saw three green blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night between 12 and 1 am i was out walking my dog in longmont co. i am always looking up at the sky. there is an airport just a little ways away so i see a large amount of planes and see various light sequences when they are at different angles and landing. but last night it was very unusual. i scanned the sky and saw nothing but stars to the south and a few distant planes to the north. when i turned around back to the south i saw a very large pulsating (never going out just bright to dim) red light pretty close and seemed to appear from no where as i just looked in that direction (longmont is really flat). it appeared about 10x the size and brightness of a typical red blinking plane navigation light. even when it was dim it was still brighter than regular planes. i saw no other lights and it was flying pretty low and slow heading west. i couldn't really tell how far away it was but i do know it was between the mountains and i. i lost sight of it behind some houses and then saw it again and then lost it for the last time as it disappeared below the roof lines. the entire siting lasted about a minute.

all i know is it was very unusual and extremely bright i see a lot of planes and i have never seen this before.
content.summary: Large bright pulsating red light, silent

content.detailedDescription: A ufo that was colored a bit of red/yellow/orange passed silently over ahead around midnight. 5 of us adults were sitting out around the fire after a graduation party. a noticed a bright glowing light in the sky. at first glance, the thought was ufo. all five adults reported seeing the object and noted that it moved quickly across the sky from the southeast moving north. did not move like normal aircraft. object disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Red/yellow/orange oval ufo silenty passed overhead at about 2,000 ft

content.detailedDescription: After a late dinner on our deck tonight , my wife and i noticed two large orange lights, one under the other moving across the sky in perfect formation. they were not blinking like planes, in fact we saw a plane in the sky at the same time. the orange fireballs were very bright and moving west to east across the sky and over a mountain. we called my  17 yr.. old son outside and he witnessed them to. after about a minute one disappeared then shortly after that the other one did. we did not see them again.
content.summary: Two orange fireballs, one under the other, moving west to east across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i was sitting in my back yard facing south east. i live near cleveland hopkins airport. i can see planes takeoff and land from my chair. at around 9:30pm i noticed a bright light heading my way from south to north. it moved in a straight line until it reached the southwest end of the airport, then went east -north east over the airport. i watched it until it was just a dot. at first i thought it was a plane until it got closer and looked at it clear as day to be engulfed in light, or ablaze. it looked as though it was checking out the airport. after getting up to look at this thing, i didn't know what think about what i just saw. about ten minutes later, here it comes again, from the same direction and flight path,except this time there happened to be a plane just taking off from cle. the pilot had to have seen this. the object then followed the same flight path as the first time. that evening there was a lower cloud deck. it also seemed the object was flying just under that cloud deck. i was purely amazed to see this and for it to happen twice within ten minutes really kind of shook me up. whether it was the same craft or another one the second time around, i'll never know. thanks,  (name deleted)fg
content.summary: Object engulfed in light moving in a direct manner

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these things on several ocasions on verious nights. they appear very bright mooving slowly with a slight zig zag motion as they travel in a certain general direction. they appear either dimm and change to bright and back to dim or disapearing all together or they appear bright and then dimm or disappear and reappear,various senarios. this happens throught the night in different parts of the sky. my first thought is satalites or some other man made objects but the zig zaging and dimming and brightening is confusing.
content.summary: Starlike objects

content.detailedDescription:
its almost a year later recalling this story, but i still remember it like it just happened. the wife and i were camping up-north @ onaway state park. unfortunately the park was pretty empty; every one showed up the day before the 4th and left the park the day after so i'm not sure if anyone else even saw besides us, we were the only ones on that half of the campground.
  on one of the last days we were there i came out of our tent in the middle of the day and, don't ask me why, i looked at the horizon through the trees in the direction of the lake and saw a stationary red glowing/flickering object. at first i thought it was a jet or something... to be honest i wasn't sure. i called my wife over and asked her what she thought it was, her first answer was 'ufo'. although i do believe in this sort of stuff, i'm also a very rational person and never though i would see anything of the sort. i know that there used to be an aircraft base within 50 or 100 miles of the campground (i'm almost positive that its inactive now, however if someone can confirm this or not) as well as a few airports here and there; at this point i'm running through a list of what kind of jet it could have been.
  i've seen lots and lots of jets (childhood hobby) including a f16 go sling wing right over my house just to disappear fast... that's not the same glow this was, before or after, not even close. it just hung in the sky at first and seemed to take forever for it to start moving although i'm sure that it was only a matter of 5 or so seconds after we noticed it. it traveled across the horizon varying in elevation at a moderate speed (not extremely fast) an inch or so up and down one or two times from my perspective (it was way out there and very bright, another reason why i didn't think it was a jet). it's movements seemed random, not extremely quick, but sudden. my wife was a bit "freeked out" so i sprinted down to the water just in time to see it disappear, literally disappear. i did loose sight of it for several seconds (10-20) running through the woods to get to the water. again i did see it disappear after i got to the water.
  i wasn't sure how to react or how i felt about the situation, i had some skepticism, but then was skeptical of my skepticism. i said "its a jet" only to say that there was no way that color matched anything i had ever seen (i'm no expert). tossing that out the window, how does a jet just disappear without the jets/visuals getting smaller and eventually disappearing? i took fireworks into consideration for about a nanosecond due to how the object acted as well as how long it lasted. i'm yet to see a firework travel horizontal.
  after seeing the dan akroyd documentary and hearing about this site, i had to share. i only recently even shared this story with my co-workers after one or two of them shared a similar story. i, at this point, am convinced that it was no known man made craft. looking at some pictures while writing this paragraph the color was identical to the red lights that seem to appear on the big deltas although i only saw one light and it was flickering for sure. as soon as i saw the pictures and that shade of red, i got chills and my eyes got watery. i may just be convincing my self of what i saw... but i'm convinced.
content.summary: Red firey/flickering object flew across the sky in random flight patern, very bright in the middle of the day

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my garage from around 10:30 to 11:00pm working with a computer and listening to the radio, which just happened to be the coast to coast am program with art bell from his program of sept. 29th of 1999. the show came to the break and i was heading from the garage to the house door a few feet away from the garage door.  i happen to notice what i thought was a 4th of july firework that was seemingly moving slowly upward from above the tree line and neighbor's house.  at that moment it had the same goldish color as would the type of firework that would go up over 100 feet and then burst into the typical firework display shell. i had heard some other small fireworks earlier in the evening and assumed this to be a larger one, typical of the college age residing a couple of blocks away. however as i kept waiting for the boom or the firework display, i realized that the "upward" direction that this object seemed to be traveling, was not upward as a firework at all, but instead was coming toward my direction.  i thought it still to be something like a large size bag or firework on fire that did not burst correctly and was burning as it came my way. i realized as it became closer that there was no sound and it was continuing in a strait line which trajectory was about to go right over my house and neighborhood. i'm noticing that the altitude was constant at this point from the time of my first seeing it to present second.  since i am interested in any such item in the sky being a ufo sighting, i gave it a quick thought, yet would never imagine to see such a thing, i was still pondering that since it was not a firework floating, then maybe a small plane that was on fire trying to make it to the airport which was exactly ahead of the object by about 5 miles.  i was seriously expecting to see the object explode or crash in thinking it now has to be a small plane.  now, at this time i was about 30 seconds into watching this object, and the total time was only 45  or so. i'm still trying to deduce it's speed as it seemed to be going slower as it was nearing the area directly over my head.  i'm trying to figure out if it were to go slow enough i'd go inside and get my video camera. i'm thinking it could be a helicopter that had a problem.  we have quite a few that head to the airport on that same line of travel.  i heard no sounds at all, and it still appeared to be around 200 to 300 feet in altitude as i could tell that as it was now directly overhead and seemingly slightly slower in forward speed, that it seemed to be somewhat spherical and yet almost like the triangle shape with 3 circles lighted up under it.  it still had that goldish and orangeish glow like burning newspaper, or the typical firework.  i'm straining as hard as i can to see details, as i'm still thinking it's going to blow up and spew darbee all over my area.  i really wanted to get my camera, but the thing kept on moving slowly toward the same course headed n.E. to the airport. i quickly moved to the center of my front yard to i could see it "land" as it closed in on the airport. note, there is a 4 lane highway behind my neighborhood area which runs north to south.  as this object began to clear my area it seemed to be gaining in altitude at a slightly increasing angle as it continued forward.  i thought it would be going on a descent path, but it was gaining height.  i still expected it to blow up, but as it was finally getting over the area where the airport was, and seemed to be about 600 feet in altitude, just went mostly "upward" and totally out of sight.  i'm thinking, did i see a ufo, because it didn't land or explode, it just vanished as it gained altitude rather quickly.  all i can say is i would have loved to photograph it as it looked like a helicopter on fire, or something on fire and ready to blow up.  i would like to know if anyone else has seen or heard of such occurrence on this eve of june 25 at 11:01 pm or anywhere near that time in the eve.  note, the sky was clear and stars and constellations clearly viable.  note, the forward speed was too fast for a helicopter but more closely that of a small plane, except when it appeared to be right over my head at it's altitude.  i did look up at it and did not take my eyes off of it one time. i was actually hoping whatever it was could see me looking up at it, and it became a bit creepy as it did not seem to be moving away as fast as it had approached my area. i still thoughth it was something on fire as it had that type of movement of light as you would see fire at a distance, the light would have some degree of appearance of movement due to the atmosphere, even at a low altitude.  when i moved to the center of my yard, i walked through the grass slowly and continued to stay fixed on the object. (i really wanted it to come back) - so i write about it to hope someone else saw a similar object in this time. when i say earlier as to when it vanished as it gained altitude rather quickly, the "rather quickly" was typical of ufo stories, as it really appeared to gain altitude so fast that i figured as i'm thinking it didn't land or blow up that it realized it's closeness to the airport and just accelerated upward.  i just had a feeling it was going to pull a move like that when it got to that specific area, and it did. in my personal thoughts about it, i'd say, i hope the thing saw me and will plan a return flight, and i will keep a video camera in the garage, ready to use.  maybe this will coincide with some crop circle activity and so on during this evening. 

(my being anonymous is only for this current time period as i'd gladly give details to a known specific as needed.  thank you from lincoln nebraska
 sorry i didn't take time to paragraph this.
content.summary: Low floating object in strait line from se to nw ascends over airport area.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke and looking east/southeast or so, 35-50 degrees (guessing here) up and see what i think is a plane in the distance.  just a flashing white light - appearing to be fairly high up - i don't see the other blinking lights like you see on a jet.  it is moving northest to southwest (left to right) and it is moving fast - the blinks are farther apart than the jets i normally see.  it then abruptly changes direction almost back on itself, but not quite, just like a pinball bouncing off a bumper - now going west/southwest to east/northeast (right to left).  it abruptly changes directions a few more times then actually follows a circular path which looks like a small loop, makes a few more direction changes, then heads either east or down and vanishes - no more blinking light.  i see nothing in that part of the sky but the stars.  i've never seen anything move like that.  like i said, at first i thouht it was a jet but it was moving too.  it was at least a few mile east of me - maybe more.  just a blinking white light in the sky.  my feelings at the time were - wow that's a fast plane then what the f?!  what am i seeing?  what did i just see?  i looked at my watch as soon as it vanished - stopped flasing - not there anymore.  i really have no idea what i saw - just sort of dumbfounded.
content.summary: Blinking light moving fast, changes directions a numbr of times, loops, disappears

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were turning onto our block in a subdivision in canandaigua ny that is located on a cul de sac.  as we came around the corned my wife and i noticed several glowing reddish objects in the sky flying from the west (i believe) to the east.  after a time the glowing would fade out except for 1 or 2 points on the blackish discs.  there were also discs with no lights flying in between the other uap's. they all seemed the same size. i have never seen a ufo before and i have never seen anything like this before!  there was no sound except for when they first came over the horizon but it fades and at one point you can see in the video that it's pretty silent with all these glowing objects flying above.  it resembles other videos i have seen over the years but usually out of mexico or south america.  i was able to grab my wife's iphone and shoot this video of them.  i stayed outside and watched them all pass, there was about 12 in all.  i watched them pretty close, they were all dark in color when not glowing, they made no sound and all flew in the same direction.  i did not feel scared or threatened in any way, i was fascinated by what i saw.  i watched them until they were all completely out of sight over the horizon.  they were flying towards rt. 332 over the stablegate development in canandaigua ny.
content.summary: A small fleet of reddish glowing discs, silent for the most part.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and i just looked up looking at the stars, as i usually do. i stared at the area to the north about 60 degrees  for about 10-15 seconds and  i saw what i guessed was a star and as i was staring at it started to get brighter and brighter till it was like headlight or flashlight bright. it held its brightness for about 3 or 4 seconds and just disappeared. in most counts i would call it a shooting star. the problem is it had to have been coming directly towards me, as it made no change in direction.
content.summary: Strange flash

content.detailedDescription: Nice clear day 10 or 11 am ,drinking coffe on the porch , i noticed a black point  in the skye , got in the house and grabbed the camera ,sat on the porch and i toke a photo of it with 80mm to 250mm zoom lence i cant  make out  wat the object is...  so  i would like  for somone to  inlarge the photo and  see wat  could it be tnx..!
content.summary: Dont  know wat it is

content.detailedDescription: Spotted a bright white unblinking object to the north and nearly overhead from my front porch. my wife and sons confirmed observing the object moving back and forth, (north to south, east to west) and in small snakelike lines as well as turning ang making small circles
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2237h cdt cuurently observing object over omaha, nebraska, since 2200h cdt

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck, chatting on the phone with my friend and star gazing. i saw a craft in the south-eastern portion of the sky. it was starlike, glowing like a star with no flashing lights and moving very swiftly in a straight line over my house. i observed the craft for aprox. 30-45 seconds, until it went over my house and the roof blocked my view. i have seen craft similar to this on several occasions over my hometown.
content.summary: One craft over my house

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside looking west at an approaching thunderstorm.  i took several digital pictures of unusual cloud formations. when looking at them later this evening, i noticed a trigualr shape in the lower center of the photo.  when zoomed in, tt seems to have several other objects surrounding it in a half moon forward position. i have not altered this picture in any way.

i did not see this object at the time of the photo and have no idea what it is, perhaps nothing.  just thought you might be interested.

ok to e-mail me if you have any ideas--atmospheric phenonomen?
content.summary: Seems to be a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
just coming out of the buddhist temple at the kadampa buddhist center in glen spey , ny. walking down the hill to my dorm i spotted this very bright silvery white oval shaped light with a short tail which seemed to intermittenly turn off and on , off and on as it sped through the sky. then it disappeared over the horizon. it was moving extremely fast. the whole sighting lasted maybe 4 or 5 seconds. 

 the only reason i'm reporting this is because of the june 25 report from venezuela of the exact same description only their color was descrbed as luminescent green and white in the middle as opposed to the flash bulb silvery white i observed.
content.summary: Very bright object , like flash bulb, streaking through the sky blinking on and off

content.detailedDescription: I am filing this as a belated report since i have not found any other reports from this time and location. incident of very clear overhead flight of rectangular craft in excess of 1,000 foot length having taken place in the potato creek state park area east of north liberty,ind.During this time period there were several other sightings and police agencies who actually followed similar craft in their vehicles.At 5:10 a.M. i entered my vehicle at state park campground, started it and then noticed the surrounding area of woods was beginning to show light like sunrise.In this area it was too early for sunrise and than i noticed a light shining down into my windshield. i than opened my driver door and stepped out onto my runningboard and looked above my vehicle.Above and slightly to the east was a very discernible and large craft emitting no noise and travelling maybe 2-3 m.P.H.I continued watching this craft travel west-northwest to a position over the reservoir,this taking about 5 minutes.The craft than entered the water in almost a direct downward movement.In a further note, that during the previous days to sighting, the reservoir water level had increased and a lot of people were talking as to how poor fishing had been lately. i than travelled into town where i had commented at a convenience store i had just seen this craft. several local bus drivers who feared for their jobs than told me i should not speak to anybody about this as a couple of their fellow employees had lost their jobs for talking about seeing this same craft. shortly after i learned their had been other local reports of these sightings and that the ind. state police had logged over 100 miles on previous dates of following this craft.There was no fear of this vehicle but an overwhelming calm as to have been given the chance to see such an exquisite vehicle.
content.summary: Large rectangle visible craft overhead flight within 500 yards.

content.detailedDescription:
I work onsite all weekend as i am the weekend manager at a retirment community.  i went out to our courtyard to have a cigarette, around 12:30am,and i noticed a large white light that was round and intense. at first i thought it was a helicopter with a spot light, as it appeared to drift a little side to side and seemed to slow down or speed up on it's trajectory.  as the light was overhead, i could hear no noise and i expected the light to dim or go out as it passed over, but it did not. i could not make out any fuselage or such, only a bright round white light. it was just as bright going as it was coming.  there were no strobe or colored lights blinking. the intensity of the light was, as i said before, was great.  i watch it as long as i could, before the treeline obscured my view.

it has left me stumped with what i saw, so i decided to report it to your site to see if anyone else may have seen the same thing that i did.

this is not the first time i have seen strange objects at night in the skagit valley.  i have had three prior wierd sightings, with corroborating witnesses, however this sighting i was alone.
content.summary: Saw a noiseless white light fly over mount vernon

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when i noticed an array of rainbow colors coming thru an upper window on my one story home. thinking someone set of an fireworks rocket , i peeked thru the front shutters and noted no more activity. i wanted to go outside to investigate further but got an erie feeling about it and did not do so. upon retiring, i kept feeling an uncomfortable sensation like there was a prescence and could not rest. i ended up turning the tv on to be able to fall asleep. the next day i looked out that same window, and noticed my neighbors tree was blocking the veiw of the sky at a 45 degree angle 11 o'clock and the two story home at 9 o'clock. thus what ever it was had to be directly overhead. the second night came and i still felt an uneasiness and had to turn on the tv again to be able to rest. i cant explain what it was. but something is forcing me to record this. what sticks with me is the colors of the light,i have never see anything like it.
content.summary: Disfused rainbow hues

content.detailedDescription: This is the last set of pictures of this object in pictures 100_5453 to 100_5458.Jpg.
content.summary: Object flashed brightly in southern sky continured....

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend in his garden, when i noticed a white light in the sky. at first i thought that it was a star even though it was probably about 3 times bigger than the biggest star i have ever seen. after 5 seconds of standing still it slowly started to move towards east, at the same time, losing intensity, and after 5-10 seconds it shrink into 2 bright spots, barely seen. another 15-20 seconds it was necessary for them to fade away. it was definitely a ufo. my friend didnt take it seriously at first, and he didnt get a second chance to look at it and maybe think twice, since it disappeared too fast; which means i didnt get a chance to catch it on tape because there was just not enough time. fascinated by this, i have made an animation of the event that fairly describes what i have seen.
content.summary: After 5 seconds of standing still it slowly started to move towards east, at the same time, losing intensity

content.detailedDescription: This object was viewed for 22 seconds when it came into view in the southern sky until i could no longer see the object in the northern sky.  same object in pictures 100_5453.Jpg to 100_5458.Jpg
content.summary: Object flashed brighty in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i had planned our vacation to myrtle beach.We had booked a week at sands ocean resort.I go to the website to checkout the resort where we were going to stay.The indoor pool has a sky cam that points north over the beach.It shows loops of the beach.The loop it was showing showed a black sphere coming into view from the south it traveled north to about midway of the camera and shot up out of site.When it got out of site it caused some kind of flash anamoaly.I have pics im sending tried to catch the whole loop but couldnt.The skycam is ran by the nbc station wmbf.
content.summary: Black sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from the supermarket, walking on the side of the street, when right in front of me this very bright phosforescent electric green fierball cross from east to west. it was not falling down, it was flying parallel to the ground. at about 50-70 meters (150-200 feet)above the ground, it was about 10 meters or 30 feet of circunference, the ball was almost white in the middle, and green in the sides, and it had a small "tale". it didnt make any kind of sound, and what i think was very peculiar, was that it did turn on and off radically, is to say, imagine seing the fireball flying across and then put something between your eyes and the ball, so you cant see it. then take it away very fast, then put it back on.. i hope this example helps you to understand my explanation.. and by the way forgive my english.
this happend very fast, but i cuold see it very well, and it was close to me. this happen in january 2005. in january 2009 i saw it again, but this time it wasnt geen, it was blue.. phosforencent bright electric blue, it was just like the first one, the same size, the same speed, it turn on and off just like the other, but it was blue. this one i saw it in hato el cedral, a wildlife refuge in the south-west of venezuela.
when i saw it the first time i was impressed, i knwe it was a ufo, it was not normal, it was not a metiorite, because they fly down to the ground.. this thing was "flying". the second time i saw it.. i felt relax.. it was like. ey here they are again...
content.summary: It was a phosphorescent green fireball flying fast  parallel to the ground. it was not falling down

content.detailedDescription: I just saw this a half hour ago, i was at longs pond just outside city limits of fort collins. i was on the shore looking out across the water when i noticed a bright light low in the sky coming from the west end of the pond. i observed this light for no more than 3 or 4 min move in dead silence west to east, first it was moving in a straight line, but a little over half way across the pond it seemed to move up and down in a very odd manner as it continued to move east. it was at this point i knew that this wasn't any aircraft i have ever seen. the way it started moving up and down it seemed as though what ever was in control of this craft was not operating the way it should. i continued watching the craft until it disappeared behind the trees of the east shore on its way toward the budweiser plant.
content.summary: Very bright light low in altitude 1500ft max, heading west to east over lake, dead silent.

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling with boyfriend, me driving on the 91 frwy from around van buren towards 60 frwy, about a mile or less before they connect. it was slightly dark out and then it was very bright, there was traffic so we were able to look at it.  i saw a bright white light the size of a football field in the sky to my left.  i saw the light being attacked by what looked like toy planes shooting at the object (2 planes)then smoke.  after that it was gone but the light dimmed in the smoke as it left.  i felt the object fled so fast and with the light so bright that light was traveling slower than the object itself.   i was in the fast lane cars were stopped at this point.  the year was between 1986 and 1993. i called the the news station and got nowhere but caught only a glimpse of what they had to say about it 5 days later. i only heard them say the bright light in the sky. in my heart i honestly believe i witnessed a ufo sighting and feel strongly that military was trying to shoot it down.  it was so shocking to see that it stuck with me all these years.  i even have told my children about it.  i wish i could remember the date but it was only who i was with and where i was at and the incident.  i never reported this to anyone in writing because i didn't want to be called crazy.  i'm much older now and i know what i saw. if at all possible i'm sure someone has documented this and i hope they saw those tiny planes as well because i would very much like to read all of what they saw and compare it to what i saw.  also, i would really like to know the date.  thank you for your time. pk
location: riverside, california
leaving van buren area on 91 frwy towards 60 frwy, before they connect. 
1. just picked up boyfriend from work. 2. the area lit up very fast.
3. ufo. but had to watch it to confirm what i thought. 4. i felt it left fast. 5. my boyfriend and i talked for some time about it afterwards. 6. the object flew the opposite of towards us because the light dimmed away from us. no photos ever taken. 1 witness, name given if needed to mufon only.  i don't recall hearing any sound at all from the object. i really don't remember any sound at all.
content.summary: Bright light size of football field, then tons of white smoke, planes shooting
